featured.text: But Oddsson’s life was saved by a creative invention: transplanting codfish skins onto human bodies.
This may help explain why younger children tend to favor the creative fields such as music, art, and writing.
To be creative, you must dare __(16)__, and courageously express your own outlook and __(17)__
Which of the following is closest in meaning to the word “venture” in the second paragraph? (A) Creative measurement.

definition.zh_def: 有創造力的，能夠產生新想法或作品的。
definition.en_def: Having the ability to create or invent something original.
definition.example: She has a creative approach to solving problems.
